titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the calendar year limitations on the use of commissary stores by certain reserves and others.
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the calendar year limitations on the use of commissary stores by certain reserves and others.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Removes the limit of 24 days per calendar year on the use of commissary stores by members of the Ready Reserve with 50 or more retirement-creditable service points and members who would be entitled to retired pay but for the fact that they are under 60 years of age.
